text:
I have Batik (used inside FOP) classes in WEB-INF/lib dir and, when servlet
engine (Resin) restarts application, following Exception occured:
java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException:
Instance(100) of org.apache.batik.gvt.GraphicsNodeRenderContext$1 already
registered
        at java.awt.RenderingHints$Key.recordIdentity(RenderingHints.java:45)
        at java.awt.RenderingHints$Key.<init>(RenderingHints.java:64)
        at
org.apache.batik.gvt.GraphicsNodeRenderContext$1.<init>(GraphicsNodeRenderContext.java:37)
        at
org.apache.batik.gvt.GraphicsNodeRenderContext.<clinit>(GraphicsNodeRenderContext.java:33)
        at
org.apache.fop.render.pdf.PDFRenderer.getRenderContext(PDFRenderer.java:458)
        at
org.apache.fop.render.pdf.PDFRenderer.renderSVGDocument(PDFRenderer.java:408)
        at
org.apache.fop.render.pdf.PDFRenderer.renderSVGArea(PDFRenderer.java:371)
creator: pikus@ais.pl
